events.message: The candidate John Doe has submitted an application for the Software Engineer position, demonstrating strong background in backend development and cloud platforms.
Application has been reviewed and categorized under Engineering due to the candidate's experience as a software developer specialized in scalable systems.
Recruiter Alice Smith has been assigned to manage the Software Engineer candidate's recruitment process to ensure timely communication and evaluation.
Initial phone screening was conducted successfully, where the candidate demonstrated solid understanding of algorithms, data structures, and cloud architecture.
The candidate responded promptly confirming availability and enthusiasm for the upcoming technical interview, expressing eagerness to discuss problem-solving skills.
Technical interview has been scheduled with the engineering panel for May 5th at 10:00 AM UTC to further assess coding skills and system design capabilities.
